document_api_meta.title: Search FBT Inventory Record
document_api_meta.env_desc: This API is used to retrieve detailed inventory change records for goods at the warehouse level.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc:
The number of results to be returned per page. 
Valid range: [1-100].

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: Pagination page token. It should be empty for the first page.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: goods_ids
request_body_param.desc: The identifiers for goods generated by Fulfilled by TikTok system, maximum length 100. If specificed, it will only show inventory records belonging to those goods, otherwise, all goods with non-zero inventory will be returned.

request_body_param.name: fbt_warehouse_ids
request_body_param.desc: The identifiers for warehouses generated by Fulfilled by TikTok system. If specificed, it will only show inventory records belonging to those warehouses, otherwise, all warehouses subscribed by merchant will be returned.

request_body_param.name: create_time_ge
request_body_param.desc: Filter inventory record creation time to show only those that are created on or after the specified date and time. Unix timestamp in seconds. `create_time_ge` is 0 by default.

request_body_param.name: create_time_le
request_body_param.desc: Filter inventory record creation time to show only those that are created on or before the specified date and time. Unix timestamp in seconds. `create_time_le` is the current time by default.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^inventory_records
response_param.desc: A list of inventory records information.

response_param.name: ^^goods
response_param.desc: The reference used to track products and SKUs within Fulfilled by TikTok's network.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The identifier for goods generated by Fulfilled by TikTok system.

response_param.name: ^^^reference_code
response_param.desc: The identifier for goods defined by merchant.

response_param.name: ^^^name
response_param.desc: The goods name.

response_param.name: ^^fbt_warehouse_id
response_param.desc: The identifier for warehouse generated by Fulfilled by TikTok  system.

response_param.name: ^^order
response_param.desc: The information of order that triggers current inventory change.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The identifier for order generated by Fulfilled by TikTok system.

response_param.name: ^^^type
response_param.desc:
The type of order.
Possible values:
- INBOUND_ORDER
- RETURN_TO_SUPPLIER_ORDER
- DISPOSAL
- INVENTORY_STATUS_ADJUSTMENT_ORDER
- CONSIGN_ORDER
- INVENTORY_COUNT_ORDER
- FAILED_DELIVERY
- CUSTOMER_RETURN
- INVENTORY_QUANTITY_ADJUSTMENT_ORDER
- OUTBOUND_TRANSFER_ORDER
- FROZEN_ORDER

response_param.name: ^^create_time
response_param.desc: The time when the inventory record is created, Unix timestamp in seconds.

response_param.name: ^^inventory_goods_type
response_param.desc:
The type of goods in current inventory record.
Possible values: 
- NORMAL 
- DEFECTIVE

response_param.name: ^^initial_on_hand_quantity
response_param.desc: The number of goods units physically in the Fulfilled by TikTok warehouse before current inventory change, excluding those in transit.

response_param.name: ^^final_on_hand_quantity
response_param.desc: The number of goods units physically in the Fulfilled by TikTok warehouse after current inventory change, excluding those in transit.

response_param.name: ^^changed_quantity
response_param.desc: The change in the number of units is calculated as the `final_on_hand_quantity` - `initial_on_hand_quantity`.

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Provide this value in the `page_token` parameter of your request if the current response does not return all the results.

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: The total number of the search results.

Node.js
